Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students who are trying to talk to each other from a distance.
The student can draw a string telephone device that uses cups and string to communicate sound.
The student can show how sound travels through the string to allow communication.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and string.
The student can depict how the device works to solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
